languages.text: "Если вы не планируете поддерживать союз с арбитрами, то мне придется покинуть свиту". {n}Соломон чеканит слова так же бесстрастно, как разряжает дробовик в преступников.{/n} "Скажу прямо — я не хочу такого развития событий".

traits.locale_text: "Если Тассера не входит в ваши планы — по долгу службы я буду вынужден оставить вас и отправиться исполнять данный мне приказ. Самостоятельно". {n}Соломон чеканит слова так же бесстрастно, как разряжает дробовик в преступников.{/n} "Предупреждаю на случай, если вы все еще заинтересованы в нашем сотрудничестве".

languages.text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."
languages.original_text: "Если вы не планируете поддерживать союз с арбитрами, то мне придется покинуть свиту". {n}Соломон чеканит слова так же бесстрастно, как разряжает дробовик в преступников.{/n} "Скажу прямо — я не хочу такого развития событий".

traits.locale_text: "If you do not plan on maintaining your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid this scenario."

"If you do not plan on maintaining your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid this scenario."

"If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

"If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

"If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

"If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr nicht vorhabt, Euer Bündnis mit den Arbites einzuhalten, bleibt mir keine Wahl, als Euer Gefolge zu verlassen." {n}Solomorne spricht jedes Wort mit derselben Lässigkeit, mit der er seine Schrotflinte in Verbrecher entleert.{/n} "Offen gesagt, ich würde es vorziehen, dieses Szenario zu vermeiden."
languages.original_text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr nicht vorhabt, Euer Bündnis mit den Arbites einzuhalten, bleibt mir keine Wahl, als Euer Gefolge zu verlassen." {n}Solomorne spricht jedes Wort mit derselben Lässigkeit, mit der er seine Schrotflinte in Verbrecher entleert.{/n} "Offen gesagt, ich würde es vorziehen, dieses Szenario zu vermeiden."

languages.text: « Si vous ne comptez pas respecter votre alliance avec l'Arbites, je serai contraint de quitter votre entourage, » {n}annonce Solomorne en prononçant chaque mot avec autant de nonchalance que lorsqu'il exécute des criminels à coups de fusil à pompe.{/n} « En toute franchise, je préférerais éviter cette issue. »
languages.original_text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous ne comptez pas respecter votre alliance avec l'Arbites, je serai contraint de quitter votre entourage, » {n}annonce Solomorne en prononçant chaque mot avec autant de nonchalance que lorsqu'il exécute des criminels à coups de fusil à pompe.{/n} « En toute franchise, je préférerais éviter cette issue. »

languages.text: “如果你无意与帝国法务部继续保持联盟关系，那我恐怕别无选择，只能离开你的队伍。”{n}索罗蒙一脸冷漠，说出的每个字都像是在向罪犯倾泻霰弹一样。{/n}“说实话，我更希望能避免这种情况。”
languages.original_text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

traits.locale_text: “如果你无意与帝国法务部继续保持联盟关系，那我恐怕别无选择，只能离开你的队伍。”{n}索罗蒙一脸冷漠，说出的每个字都像是在向罪犯倾泻霰弹一样。{/n}“说实话，我更希望能避免这种情况。”

languages.text: «Si no planea mantener su alianza con el Arbites, no tendré más opción que abandonar su séquito». {n}Solomorne pronuncia cada palabra con la misma naturalidad que muestra al vaciar su escopeta contra los criminales.{/n} «Sinceramente, preferiría evitar esa situación».
languages.original_text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

traits.locale_text: «Si no planea mantener su alianza con el Arbites, no tendré más opción que abandonar su séquito». {n}Solomorne pronuncia cada palabra con la misma naturalidad que muestra al vaciar su escopeta contra los criminales.{/n} «Sinceramente, preferiría evitar esa situación».

languages.text: 「高等裁定局との同盟を維持するつもりがないなら、私はあなたの側近を去るしかありません」{n}ソロモーンは犯罪者にショットガンを撃ち込む時と同じ無頓着な口調で言った。{/n}「正直なところ、そのような事態は避けたいと思っています」
languages.original_text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

traits.locale_text: 「高等裁定局との同盟を維持するつもりがないなら、私はあなたの側近を去るしかありません」{n}ソロモーンは犯罪者にショットガンを撃ち込む時と同じ無頓着な口調で言った。{/n}「正直なところ、そのような事態は避けたいと思っています」

languages.text: "Arbites'le kurduğunuz ittifakı sürdürmeyi düşünmüyorsanız maiyetinizden ayrılmaktan başka çarem kalmaz." {n}Solomorne, suçluları pompalıyla avlarkenki kayıtsızlığıyla her sözcüğü tek tek savuruyor.{/n} "Açıkçası bu neticeden kaçınmayı yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: "If you do not plan to maintain your alliance with the Arbites, I will have no choice but to leave your retinue." {n}Solomorne speaks every word with the same nonchalance he shows when emptying his shotgun into criminals.{/n} "Frankly, I would prefer to avoid that scenario."

traits.locale_text: "Arbites'le kurduğunuz ittifakı sürdürmeyi düşünmüyorsanız maiyetinizden ayrılmaktan başka çarem kalmaz." {n}Solomorne, suçluları pompalıyla avlarkenki kayıtsızlığıyla her sözcüğü tek tek savurur.{/n} "Açıkçası bu neticeden kaçınmayı yeğlerim."
